OrgName.entry: ST PAULS CHURCH AND CENTRE, NORTON LEES - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: The Meeting Place, capacity 40 seated and kitchen. The Upper Hall, capacity 60 with kitchenette for making drinks. The Nave, capacity 200 including a dais for presentations. The Old Vestry, a bright and inviting carpeted room for small groups, capacity 25. There are facilities for making drinks and a toilet nearby. Also available is the Scout Hall measuring 7.5 x 11.5 metres, a pleasant newly decorated hall with more basic facilities than the above 4 rooms, which is set in its own fenced-off grounds on Welby Place with limited off road parking and a level grassy area, capacity 40 seated. Bookings are taken for business meetings, social occasions, concerts, children's birthday parties and various group activities.

DisabledAccess.entry: All rooms are wheelchair accessible, apart from the Old Vestry, which is only accessible via steps. Induction loop in Nave only.
